title: Hour 1: Goodell vs. Watson
description:
Mad Dog Russo, Chris Canty and Jay Williams join the show to discuss Roger Goodell calling Deshaun Watson's actions "predatory behavior." The crew also debates whether Kevin Durant will be in a Nets uniform this season. Later they debate if Aaron Rodgers will win another Super Bowl, and if Serena Williams is the G.O.A.T of women's tennis.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
